医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
探索SNP在冠状动脉微血管功能障碍的早期诊断中的作用一项新的综述强调了单核苷酸多态性（SNP）在改善冠状动脉微血管功能障碍（CMD）的早期诊断和靶向干预方面的潜在作用 - 尽管没有主要动脉阻塞，但与心肌缺血有关的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/20250226/exploring-the-role-of-snps-inps-in-early-diangnosis-for-cororonary-coronary-micrascular-dysfunction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/20250226/exploring-the-role-of-snps-inps-in-early-dingnosis-for-cororonary-coronary-microwascular-dysfunction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ef5bd1A-9E49-4267-4267-B408-5F7209EF0A97 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 11:21:12 -0500 Exploring the role of SNPs in early diagnosis of coronary microvascular dysfunction
Tardigrade蛋白为癌症患者提供辐射保护美国所有癌症患者中约有60％接受放射疗法作为治疗的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/tardigrade-protein-froteer-radiation-pradiation-protection-for-cancer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/tardigrade-protein-froteer-radiation-prodiation-protection-for-for-cancer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=363E4D61-D506-4ED2-A5CF-5CF-579F8C156779 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 11:17:05 -0500 Tardigrade protein offers radiation protection for cancer patients
Biohit介绍了用于凳子样品收集和处理的FAEX™样品系统Biohit的FAEX样品系统简化了粪便样品处理，将多功能性与易用性相结合，以提高诊断过程的效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/biohit-intrododuces-the-faexe284a2-sample-sample-system-sample-system-for-sample-sample-sample-collection-collection-collection-andling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/biohit-intrododuces-the-faexe284a2-sample-samples-samy-system-for-sample-sample-sample-collection-collection-collection-collection-collection-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3Ad74E7-2481-4B9A-A6A6-3265A0A51796 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 09:56:00 -0500 BIOHIT introduces the FAEX™ Sample System for stool sample collection and handling
荷马尔顿大学医院的Landmark研究证实了Astropanel®的诊断准确性斯托帕纳尔的临床验证强调了其在早期胃癌风险评估中的作用，为侵入性手术提供了具有成本效益的替代方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/landmark-study-atudy-at-homerton-university-hospital-confirms-confirms-gastropanelc2aee28099s-diagnostic-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/20250226/landmark-study-atudy-at-homerton-university-hospital-confirms-gastropanelc2aee28099s-diagnostic-culacy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1CA4D7EB-BAD1-4809-9B8D-BA365C5E7BCB Wed, 26 Feb 2025 09:53:00 -0500 Landmark study at Homerton University Hospital confirms GastroPanel®’s diagnostic accuracy
药物发现中的微生物生理系统新闻媒体与CN BIO谈到了体外器官片（OOC）模型，微生物生理系统及其体内对应物之间的转换性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/microphysiolysiology-systems-in-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/microphysiolyalysysystems-in-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15D1Fe48-B5AC-4565-B124-390F496876D5 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 09:08:00 -0500 Microphysiological systems in drug discovery
脂质签名可以指导性肠癌的个性化治疗大肠癌是与癌症相关死亡的第二大最常见原因，每年在全球范围内影响近200万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/lipid-signatures-could-guide-personalized-treatment-forefor-colororectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/lipid-signatures-could-guide-personalized-treatment-for-colororectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a6f3A15-00E4-4E6A-B6F4-08F18E31643B Wed, 26 Feb 2025 09:07:35 -0500 Lipid signatures could guide personalized treatment for colorectal cancer
新的低成本工具可以革新2型糖尿病治疗根据今天在2025年糖尿病专业会议上宣布的开创性研究，数以百万计的2型糖尿病患者可以通过一种新的，简单的低成本工具获得更好的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-low-cost-cost-tool-could-could-revolutionsize-type-type-2-diabetes-wareatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-low-cost-cost-tool-could-could-revolutionize-type-type-2-diabetes-wareatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B3220AB-9FB4-4F4C-9FCE-9FCE-5BE825094339 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 08:55:37 -0500 New low-cost tool could revolutionize type 2 diabetes treatment
NSHAP研究检查了后时代的认知和衰老B系列《老年学期刊》的新补充问题：心理科学和社会科学介绍了国家社会生活，健康和衰老项目（NSHAP）的第4轮（2021年至2023年）期间收集的新措施，方法和数据 - 重点是认知以及研究人员如何适应与参与者的合作，这是由于COVID-19的大流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/nshap-study-examines-cognition-and-gagnition-and-aging-in-post-in-post-covid-era.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/nshap-study-examines-cognition-and-agnition-and-aging-in-post-in-post-covid-covid-era.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c4105d1-aeef-4627-ACF2-D080588A5204 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 08:37:52 -0500 NSHAP study examines cognition and aging in post-COVID era
新的AI模型彻底改变了显微镜中的细胞结构分割显微镜图像中识别和描绘细胞结构对于理解复杂的生命过程至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-ai-model-revolutions-cell-scoldure-strenture-sentermenture-segentation-in-microscopy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-ai-model-revolutions-cell-structure-scontrure-sentermenture-sentermention-in-microscopy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0558387C-CAB8-41CB-A9F7-2C3A67250E21 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 08:31:19 -0500 New AI model revolutionizes cell structure segmentation in microscopy
LMU研究发现树突状细胞在免疫反应中的双重功能LMU研究人员表明，特定类型的免疫细胞的作用比以前想象的更灵活 - 具有新的治疗方法的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/lmu-study-uncovers-dual-functionality-functionality-ofdendritic-cells-cells-cells-in-mmmune-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/lmu-study-uncovers-dual-functionality-dendritic-cells-dendritic-cells-in-mmmune-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2775f10a-8687-44EA-8912-A55E847F463F Wed, 26 Feb 2025 08:17:00 -0500 LMU study uncovers dual functionality of dendritic cells in immune response
